ratings.comment: Eren is awesome. One of my favorite lecturers in psych department and this is my favorite Breadth course in psych. She is super caring and accessible outside the class. The slides are so structured and easy to follow. It has exams but they are not that difficult as long as you pay attention to class and read through textbooks.Would highly recommend

Eren is a super sweet grad student/teacher. However, the class material was overbearing. I found it difficult to study everything that could've been on the exam. Also the class was a power lec & sometimes painful to sit through--it was in Van Vleck tho. The exams were harder, but good amount of assignments to get an an AB or A.

I loved Fukuda and this class. Her lectures are super interesting and engaging, and I feel like I learned a lot after each class. Helpful study guides are provided and exams are fairly easy if you study. While being a newer professor, Fukuda is awesome!

Her class is exactly what I expect a great college course to be! Tophat attendance questions-which I actually like because it really forces you to learn the material because memorization is crucial for the exams. So sweet, interesting concepts, and she clearly seems happy to be doing what she is doing. All assignments are easy. Highly recommend!

Very well-organized and well-delivered lectures It was apparent that she was very passionate and knowledgeable about the content. The homework assignments were very helpful and the exams were tough but fair, mostly just requiring the memorization of content. Reading the textbook is very helpful, but you can get by without it if you do the homework.

Great lecturer! Provides an opportunity to gain extra points. Cares about student input. Always reminds you when assignments are due. Heavy on memorization of concepts (like all psych classes). Make sure to do assigned textbook readings!!!
